report:
**Damage Report:**

**Vehicle Make/Model:** [Insert Vehicle Information]
**VIN:** [Insert VIN Number]
**Date of Inspection:** [Insert Date]

**Location of Damage:**
- The damage is located on the fender of the vehicle, near the rear wheel well.

**Type of Damage:**
- There appears to be a scratch or scuff mark on the paint surface of the fender. The scratch is linear and runs horizontally along the fender, starting from the wheel well area towards the rear of the vehicle.
- The scratch seems to be relatively shallow but has caused some discoloration in the paint, indicating that it may have been caused by a minor impact or rubbing against an object.

**Additional Notes:**
- No other visible damage such as dents, dings, or deeper scratches is observed on the fender or surrounding areas.
- The tire and wheel appear to be in good condition with no signs of damage.

**Conclusion:**
The vehicle has sustained a minor scratch on the fender, which requires attention for repair. Further inspection may be necessary if the scratch is deep enough to affect the structural integrity of the fender.

**Prepared By:**
[Your Name]  
Insurance Adjuster  
[Your Company Name]  
[Contact Information]  

**Attachments:**
- Photographs of the damage (not included in this text report).

**End of Report.**
